hasAttributes.name: AssetId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of an Asset.

hasAttributes.name: ContractId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

hasAttributes.name: PropertyId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Property.

hasAttributes.name: PropertyLocationId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Property Location.

hasAttributes.name: PartyId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Party.

hasAttributes.name: PeriodStartDate
hasAttributes.description: The period start date that the party had an interest in the property location.

hasAttributes.name: AssetContractNote
hasAttributes.description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the asset contract.

definitions.description: The one or more contracts that address the associated property location party relationship and define the terms, conditions and legal relationship of parties in regard to that property location.
